Title: AKA Three Lives and Counting
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Jack Kenny, Lisa Randolph, Melissa Rosenberg (created by)
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Rachael Taylor, Eka Darville, Janet McTeer
Plot: Shocked by her own actions and haunted by visions of Kilgrave, Jessica worries she's turning into a monster. Trish's plans for Karl become clear.
